name: nostr-ws-inspector
description: Browser extension to inspect Nostr WebSocket traffic

scripts.package: npm run build && zip -r extension.zip manifest.json *.js *.html -x 'node_modules/*' 'src/*' 'screenshots/*' 'store-assets/*' '.git/*' '*.zip' '*.log' '.DS_Store' 'README.md' 'package.json' 'tsconfig.json' 'yarn.lock'
